title: Getting Started with React Development
description: Learn the fundamentals of React and start building modern web applications.
author: Michael Park
content:
React has revolutionized the way we build web applications. Its component-based architecture and virtual DOM make it both powerful and efficient.

In this guide, we'll cover the essential concepts:

- Components and Props
- State Management
- Hooks
- Effect Management
- Routing

By the end, you'll have a solid foundation in React development.
